name: Play With Me (itch) (varun_official)
description:
Hi everyone,

I'm Varun, the developer of this game. This game called "Play With Me". it is basically an introduction for the full game that i am working on. If everything goes well i'd turn the full game into a 3D based game.

Play With Me is fictional story and the choices you make lead you to different endings

I made this game while learning 'How to make games' on Udemy. I am a beginner so go easy on me when you comment. Leave me a suggestion or what you would like me to update, i'd fix it through an update.

If anyone donate me it'd be help for the main project to design characters ect 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The text based game has been updated. I am working on the full version which will be 3D based where you will play as "Jason" and find out the way out of the nightmare. it will be launched soon.

Players can play as the Cannibal as well. In some point of the game you will be playing as the cannibal/zombie.
